Room.Name: Necropolis Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the south end of the circle, which goes around the fountain.
Room.LongDescription: The gravel path leads south, up to a low, white building. Outside the building there is a sign which reads 'Administration'. Next to the building is a small grove of trees which appear to be dead and quite ugly. Standing here, in the middle of the city's necropolis, they seem to have taken on a new appearence, twisted and gnarled with age, and very unfriendly looking...
